hotels.title: Convenient Scotland Stay in Aberdeen Airport near City Centre
hotels.description: Ideally positioned a short walk from the terminal, Crowne Plaza Aberdeen Airport, an IHG Hotel, is perfect for a convenient stay in this historic Scottish port city. Take the free shuttle to Dyce Station, where a train will whisk you into the city in 10 minutes, and discover intriguing museums, gorgeous architecture, and a range of dining options. For a change of pace, check out the Royal Aberdeen Golf Club 15 minutes from your hotel, or indulge in sophisticated whiskies at the nearby Glen Garioch Distillery.
